data.prayer: Father, encourage the 80,862 believers in Oriental Mindoro to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Oriental Mindoro, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Oriental Mindoro, Philippines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 80,862 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Oriental Mindoro, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 499,637 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 80,862 believers in Oriental Mindoro, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Oriental Mindoro, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Oriental Mindoro.

data.section_summary:
the state of Oriental Mindoro, Philippines has a population of 580,500.

We estimate Oriental Mindoro has 80,862 people who might know Jesus, 447,191 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 52,446 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.
